name: rococo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the very decorated and detailed style in buildings, art, and furniture that was popular in Europe in the 18th century

Furniture & fittings - general words
a very decorated and detailed style in buildings, art, and furniture that was popular in Europe in the 18th century: The collection is known mainly as a treasure-house of the French rococo. Rococo remained popular in the provinces and in Italy until Napoleonic times.
More examplesFewer examplesrichly embossed, deeply carved, and sumptuously gilded pieces of French rococoThe only rococo is in the plasterwork of the salon's ceiling. The rococo here is something people find easy to hate.
